level.text: Appointed members of the Board shall serve two (2) year terms.
Ex-officio members of the Board shall be members as long as they continue to hold the office or position which entitles them to Board membership.
Alternates may be designated for all members. Appointments of alternates shall be effective only upon prior written designation from the member to the Chairperson or to the Executive Director.

If an appointed member is absent from three (3) consecutive meetings of the Board, the position of that member shall be deemed to be vacant as of the third (3rd) meeting, and a successor shall be appointed to fill the unexpired term of that member.
